content: @Mara I think you maybe created the milestone on rust-lang/rust? I think a project-wide project board (i.e. in the rust-lang org) may be a better fit, since we'll be tracking cargo work too for example
Milestones are also predominantly used for releases and editions don't quite match that well today
Ah I tried to copy the 2018 edition, which also had a milestone i think? But also a board apparently. Haven't used boards on github much yet, but looks like that'd work great for this!
I'm not sure if you have rights to create an org wide board, but if not just give me a ping :)
Oh, looks like that already exists? Since july: https://github.com/orgs/rust-lang/projects/7
i only looked under the rust repo, not the rust-lang org
Can someone with permissions add #65512 to the edition project and remove the custom note on prelude changes that's already there?
